Key Match Events: Trey Murphy III glides in for a massive dunk
Herbert Jones rocks the rim with powerful flush
Yves Missi elevates for the big-time swat
McCollum and Murray lead the Pelicans to a 2nd win in 3 days over the Wizards
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum scored 25 points and Dejounte Murray had a triple-double to help the New Orleans Pelicans to a second straight victory over the Washington Wizards, 110-98
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans won their second game in three days
The Wizards lost at home to the Pelicans for the second time this season
The game was played at Capital One Arena in Washington, DC with an attendance of 15,451
Others: The regular season series between the Pelicans and Wizards is 2-0 in favor of the Pelicans
